Ian Douglas Smith , managing director of Cornish sustainable energy charity Community Energy Plus, said: Without the Government's clean energy cash-back incentives the projects that we're currently working on with local communities simply wouldn't be financially viable.`` I'm pleased that the Government has recognised the role that domestic and community-scale renewables have to play in securing the country's energy needs from greener sources but hope that if earlier-than-scheduled changes are made to the Feed-in Tariff rates for large scale schemes, exceptions will be made to ensure that the development of community-scale renewable projects is not hindered. The Government said it wants to reduce the costs of the scheme by around 10 per cent(? 40 million) over the next four years. RGA Mike Pence decision`` major coup'' for RGA- David Catanese: Mike Pence decision`` major coup'' for RGA Indiana Mike Pence isn't running for president, which means a gubernatorial run is almost inevitable. Mike Pence won't formally announce his gubernatorial campaign on Thursday-a state law prohibits announced candidates from raising money during the state legislative session, scheduled to end April-but he fully intends to run for governor, a source with knowledge of his thinking told POLITICO. Mike Pence was Perry's first recruitment call after he became chairman, a source with knowledge of the call told POLITICO, and Mike Pence met in Washington on Wednesday with Virginia Gov.
